ESRS reference
ESRS E5 Disclosure Requirement E5-5
Key terms
Quantitative metrics, resource outflows, ESRS E5 Disclosure Requirement E5-5
Background
ESRS E5-5 states that an undertaking shall disclose information on its resource inflows, including
waste, related to its material impacts, risks and opportunities.
